__comments: Template JSON Config file describing what each (or most) of the values are
VIServer: <Physical ESXi host or vCenter Server to deploy vSphere 6.5 lab>
VIUsername: <either in form of user (for ESXI)   or user@ssodomain (for vCenter)>
DeploymentTarget: <Specifies whether deployment is to an ESXi host or vCenter Serve. Use either ESXI or VCENTER>
NestedESXiApplianceOVA: <Full Path to the Nested ESXi 6.5 VA>
VCSADeploymentSize: <one of tiny, small, medium, large or xlarge
VCSAHostname: <specify hostname or IP address if you don't have valid DNS>
VCSASSODomainName: <name for the SSO Domain ex: vghetto.local
VCSARootPassword: <password for root user on VCSA Appliance>
VMDatastore: <name of datastore to deploy VMS to>
